```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
datafest <- mini_clicks
```

```{r,message=FALSE}

datafest1 <- datafest %>%
  mutate(new_date_time = ymd_hms(date_time),
         srch_checkin = ymd(srch_ci),
         srch_co = ymd(srch_co)) %>%
  inner_join(destinations, by = "srch_destination_id") %>%
  select(new_date_time,
         user_location_country, 
         user_location_city,
         user_location_region,
         orig_destination_distance,
         srch_destination_id,
         srch_destination_name,
         is_package, 
         srch_ci, 
         srch_co,
         is_booking) %>%
  filter(is_booking == '1', user_location_country == 'UNITED STATES OF AMERICA',
         user_location_region == "CA") %>%
  group_by(user_location_region) %>%
  summarize(pop_dest = n_distinct(srch_destination_name))
  


```
